EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2019-03-13 Turbonomic 6.3.ES-20190301-Invite 2.Whole Emails Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Introducing Turbonomic 6.3
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-whats-new/]]>
Register & Enter to Win $100 Amazon Gift Card <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-whats-new/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
This week, we're excited to announce new AI-powered capabilities that further empower customers to continuously manage and optimize hybrid and multi-cloud environments.
Register Now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-whats-new/]]>
Attend our webinar on March 13, 2019 at 11 ET for the "Accelerate and Optimize Your Hybrid and Public Cloud Adoption Strategy <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-whats-new/]]>" where Alex Hesterberg, Chief Customer Officer, and Eric Wright, Director of Technical marketing will discuss the new features including:
- Cloud Autoscaling - Reserved Instance (RI) Enhancements - Kubernetes
I hope you'll join us! Register now and enter to win a $100 Amazon Gift Card.
Thanks, Andrew
PS. If you can't attend, register anyway <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-whats-new/]]> and we will send you the recording afterward.
